forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Haze. Mostly sunny, with a high near 87. South southwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Haze. Partly cloudy, with a low around 70. South wind 9 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Haze before 8am, then haze and a slight chance of rain showers between 8am and 2pm, then haze and a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 88, with temperatures falling to around 82 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 10 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Haze and showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 60. Northwest wind 5 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 5pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 83. Southwest wind around 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 11pm, then rain and a chance of thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 53, with temperatures rising to around 56 overnight. Southwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
